plot: Cartman becomes an evangelical preacher when the boys break off from their church. Meanwhile, the feud between Saddam and Chris continues.

In the second half of this two-part episode, Chris and Saddam Hussein are violently battling each other for Satan's affections, while Satan becomes increasingly confused over which one is right for him. On Earth, Cartman's new church is receiving telephone calls from Kenny (who didn't die, but just ended up in Mexico), which Cartman uses to scare the kids with images of the afterlife.—Jean-Marc Rocher <rocher@fiberbit.net>
